data.title: Envelope addressed to a U.S. senator tests positive for ricin poison.
Muslims worldwide have raced to social media websites to pray that perpetrators of a deadly bombing in Boston would not be Muslims
"Wherever we find Americans we will kill them, but we don't have any connection with the Boston Explosions" - Pakistani Taliban
Black Monday in Iraq: 46 killed, almost 300 injured in series of attacks

Sir Ian McKellen posts statement to remind all that Margaret Thatcher was in favor of and voted for Section 28, which was "...designed to slander homosexuality, by prohibiting state schools from discussing positively gay people and our 'pretended family relations'".
Boston plane grounded because two passengers speak Arabic
New Zealand set to legalize gay marriage
US Black Hawk crashes near North Korean border.
Men removed from flight at Boston airport for speaking Arabic
